doc.title: Nora
doc.plot: Nora tells the story of a family's loss, grief, and redemption. James and Beth, a happily married couple, lose their only daughter in a tragic accident. Torn apart by grief, James and Beth find their marriage unraveling when their little girl miraculously returns to help her father heal. However, James is the only one who can see her, leading both James and his friends to questions James's sanity. By turns poignant and hilarious, this masterfully crafted story answers the question of how do we go on after losing those we love the most.
